contents: Article 9 (Chairman) ① The head of the member sports organization shall be the chairman of the general meeting. However, when the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to unavoidable reasons, the order determined by the Chairman when electing the Vice President or, if there is no such order, the seniority among the Vice Presidents becomes the Chairman. ② In the case of a general meeting convened pursuant to Article 8, Paragraph 3, the senior of the directors, delegates or auditors who requested the convocation of the general meeting shall be the person with the authority to convene the general meeting, and the chairperson shall be elected from among the delegates present, presided over by the senior of the delegates present. [Full revision 2017. 3. 23.]
